text: Ndipo iwo adzalira pofuna chipulumutso nati, “Ambuye wathu! Tichotseni kuno. Ife tikachita zinthu zabwino kusiyana ndi zimene tinali kuchita”. “Kodi Ife sitidakusungeni ndi moyo nthawi yaitali kuti iye amene amalabadira akadazindikira za zimenezi? Ndipo kwa inu kudadza mchenjezi kotero lawani chilango chifukwa munthu wochimwa alibe woti angamuthandize”
